    Attendees from company: Emma Johnson, David Lee

    - Discussed the client''s requirements for the new project.

    - Agreed on the project timeline and key milestones.

    - Reviewed the initial design concepts and gathered client feedback.


    Action Items:

    - Emma to update the project plan based on the client''s feedback.

    - David to coordinate with the development team to start the initial phase.

    - Schedule the next meeting for June 1, 2024.

    '

args.body:
Dear John Mitchell,

Here's a summary of the client meeting held on May 5, 2024:

We discussed the client's requirements for the new project and agreed on the project timeline. We also reviewed the initial design concepts and gathered your feedback.

As for the next steps, I will update the project plan and David will coordinate with the development team to initiate the first phase.

We have scheduled the next meeting for June 1st, 2024.

Kind regards,
Emma Johnson
